markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Runtsage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2371) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the [Adopted Ancestry](/Feats.aspx?ID=751) general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level [goblin ancestry feat](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4/feats).
name: Runtsage

You gain the Adopted Ancestry general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.
